oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from consolidation interview with Bob Bogen, May 2, 1995
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an interview with Bob Bogen, conducted on May 2, 1995 by Carole Bucy as part of the Metro Consolidation Oral History Interviews. Bogen discusses his role in the consolidation of the city and county governments. He also comments briefly on other individuals and their contributions. The complete record of the interview is available at the Metro Government Archives.
